publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6771 Jeremy Purvis: Response to the Report of the Independent Budget Review Panel—That the Parliament calls on the Scottish Government to publish its detailed policy intentions in response to each recommendation in the report of the Independent Budget Review Panel at the earliest opportunity and no later than the first week of the parliamentary term after the current summer recess. Supported by: Hugh O’Donnell*, Jamie Stone*, Mike Pringle*, Robert Brown*, Mike Rumbles*, Liam McArthur*, Ross Finnie*, Margaret Smith*
